statements: SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_name = 'Luxury Villa' AND neighborhood = 'Beverly Hills';
SELECT property_id, property_name, price FROM properties WHERE price > 1000000;
SELECT neighborhood, COUNT(*) AS num_properties FROM properties GROUP BY neighborhood;
SELECT property_name, square_feet, price FROM properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE square_feet BETWEEN 2000 AND 3000;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE square_feet > 2000 ORDER BY price DESC, property_name ASC;
SELECT property_name, neighborhood, price FROM properties WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT property_name, square_feet, neighborhood FROM properties WHERE price < 500000 ORDER BY square_feet DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE neighborhood IN ('Suburb1', 'Suburb2') ORDER BY property_name ASC, square_feet DESC;
SELECT property_name, square_feet, price FROM properties WHERE price >= 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM properties ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, neighborhood FROM properties WHERE square_feet > 2000
SELECT id, name, price FROM properties WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown'
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods WHERE average_price_per_sqft < 200
SELECT name, price FROM properties WHERE price BETWEEN 100000 AND 500000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, price FROM properties WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE square_feet > 1500 ORDER BY name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT name, price, neighborhood FROM properties WHERE price > 500000 AND square_feet < 2000;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE neighborhood = 'Uptown' OR neighborhood = 'Midtown' ORDER BY square_feet ASC, price DESC;
SELECT id, name, square_feet, neighborhood, price FROM properties WHERE price BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY square_feet DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhood;
SELECT neighborhood_name FROM Neighborhood ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, price, property_size FROM Property WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, property_type FROM Neighborhood JOIN Property ON Neighborhood.neighborhood_id = Property.neighborhood_id;
SELECT property_name, location_name FROM Property JOIN PropertyLocation ON Property.property_id = PropertyLocation.property_id;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhood;
SELECT property_name, price FROM Property WHERE price > 5000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) FROM Neighborhood JOIN Property ON Neighborhood.neighborhood_id = Property.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_name;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price FROM Property WHERE neighborhood_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location_name, square_footage FROM PropertyLocation WHERE square_footage > 2000 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, neighborhood_id FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC;
SELECT property_type, square_feet, price FROM Properties WHERE price > 100000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, price FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Properties ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Properties.neighborhood_id WHERE square_feet > 2000;

SELECT neighborhood_name, total_properties, total_price, average_price_per_sqft FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Calculations ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Calculations.neighborhood_id WHERE total_properties > 5 AND average_price_per_sqft < 200;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'House' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(property_id) AS total_properties FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Properties ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Properties.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_name;
SELECT neighborhood_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Properties ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Properties.neighborhood_id GROUP BY neighborhood_name;
SELECT property_id, neighborhood_name, square_feet, price FROM Properties JOIN Neighborhoods ON Properties.neighborhood_id = Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown';
SELECT neighborhood_name, total_properties, total_price, average_price_per_sqft FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Calculations ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Calculations.neighborhood_id;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood;
SELECT name, neighborhood_id FROM neighborhood ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT property_id, price FROM property WHERE square_footage > 2000;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location WHERE latitude < 40.0;
SELECT property_id, type FROM property_type WHERE type = 'house';
SELECT * FROM neighborhood ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT property_id, neighborhood_id, price FROM property WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_per_square_foot WHERE average_price_per_sqft BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY average_price_per_sqft ASC;
SELECT property_id, type FROM property_type WHERE type LIKE '%apartment%' ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT * FROM location WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
